title: Heavenly Genius - Novel Updates
tags: Cultivation   Cunning Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Multiple Transported Individuals   Shameless Protagonist   Transmigration
author: Traversing Thousand Sorrows   Yue Qianchou   跃千愁
description: What will happen if the ingenious tomb raider of our world finds one mysterious mirror and moves into the world of cultivators? Such happiness happened to Lord Tao, who, using only his cunning and intellectual abilities, will have to prove to this new world the power of his mind.>
